briefTitle: Newborn Ventilation in the Delivery Room: Could it be Improved With a T-piece Resuscitator?
officialTitle: NEWBORN VENTILATION IN THE DELIVERY ROOM: CAN IT BE IMPROVED WITH A T-PIECE RESUSCITATOR? Multicenter Cross-over Cluster Randomized Controlled Trial
summary: A multicenter cross-over cluster randomized controlled trial protocol study in newborn infants ≥ 26 weeks gestational age requiring assisted ventilation (positive pressure ventilation \[PPV\]) for resuscitation in the delivery room comparing a T-piece resuscitator device versus resuscitation bag.

primaryOutcome.measure: Proportion of Infants With a HR ≥ 100 Bpm at 2 Minutes of Life.

effectByArm.arm: SIB - Self Inflating Bag With PEEP Valve
